```{r}
FLUXDATA<-data.frame(LFUX=rexp(500),Temp=rnorm(500),IRR=rnorm(500))

finalexpmodel = nls(LFLUX ~ b1*exp(b2 * Temp + b3  * Temp^2) + b4 * IRR + b5, data = FLUXDATA, start = list(b1 = 1, b2 = 0.5, b3 = 0.5, b4 = 0.5, b5 = 0.5), control = list(maxiter = 2000))
summary(finalexpmodel)
```
